content: WorkAsPro.com | Scammer , did not pay the Bounty huntersCode:[center][url=https://workaspro.com/][img]https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/08/29/MpoJT.png[/img][/url][url=https://workaspro.com/][img]https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/06/08/AQyHj.png[/img][/url] [url=https://twitter.com/workas_pro][img]https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/06/08/AQYKq.png[/img][/url] [url=https://t.me/workaspro][img]https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/06/08/AQJsG.png[/img][/url] [url=https://linkedin.com/company/workaspro][img]https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/06/08/AQV7D.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ideaology.io/][img]https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/06/08/AQvyP.png[/img][/url] [url=https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5455852.msg62379693#msg62379693][img]https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/07/04/SeJho.png[/img][/url][/center][url=https://workaspro.com/]WorkAsPro[/url] is the world’s first Blockchain-Based Freelancing Platform. The future of freelance is now. Earn and pay with crypto with efficient transactions and robust protections through smart contracts wherever you are based. Recently they have successfully finished their bounty campaign. And now they want to launch a signature campaign to spread the WorkAsPro Brand awareness all over the forum.[hr][b]Rules and Requirements[/b][left][size=10pt] [list][li]Participants feel free to keep discussion on in the [url=https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5455852]WorkAsPro Ann thread[/url].[/li][/list][list][li]You must wear the appropriate Signature, Avatar to be eligible for payment[/li][/list][list][li]A minimum [b]15[/b] constructive posts each week must be done. If you fail to meet the minimum you will not get any payment for that week.[/li][/list][list][li]Less than 150 characters long post will not be counted[/li][/list][list][li]The posts are in [b]Off-Topic, Archival, Games and Rounds, Politics & Society,  Press, Local Board, posts in any bounty and signature campaign thread, and Posts where signature does not show[/b] are not counted as eligible.[/li][/list][list][li]If you fail to make the minimum posts two weeks in a row, you will be removed[/li][/list][list][li]You can not make posts with AI-generated text. If you do you will be marked as an abuser and blacklisted from any type of my campaigns [/li][/list][list][li]Any type of spamming or burst posting is not allowed[/li][/list][list][li]If you are tagged by any DT with a Legitimate reason you are not eligible to apply for this campaign[/li][/list][list][li]You will be removed without any payment if you get a negative tag during enrolling in this campaign[/li][/list][list][li]You must only use the WorkAsPro signature in your profile. You can not use other projects' signatures.[/li][/list][list][li]Alternative accounts are not allowed. If we find you are enrolling with more than one bitcointalk account. You will be removed and tagged[/li][/list][list][li]WorkAsPro reserves the right to disqualify any users / change any rules at any time[/li][/list][list][li]As a campaign manager I reserve the right to disqualify any user and change any rules at any time [/li][/list][list][li]Particiapnts will be paid directly to their Polygon wallet address.[/li][/list][list][li]Local Board posts will not be counted as eligible.[/li][/list][/left][hr][b]Payouts & Positions:[/b][size=10pt][left][list][li]4x Hero/Legendary members - [glow=green,2,300][color=white] [b] $50 worth of IDEA token[/b][/color][/glow] / week [/li][li]5x Sr members - [glow=green,2,300][color=white] [b] $35 worth of IDEA token[/b][/color][/glow]  / week [/li][li]6x Full members - [glow=green,2,300][color=white] [b] $25 worth of IDEA token[/b][/color][/glow] / week [/li][li]5x Member - [glow=green,2,300][color=white] [b] [s]$15[/s] $10 worth of IDEA token[/b][/color][/glow] / week [/li][/list][/left][b]Payday[/b][left][list][li]The weekly payment will be sent to your Polygon Wallet address every Friday(weekly period Friday to Thursday).[/li][li]Posts after 23:59 UTC Thursday will be counted towards the following week.[/li][/list][/left][hr][center][b]Avatar[/b][img]https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/08/15/MUkaf.png[/img][b]Link :[/b]
